ARABIC: ٱقْرَأْ كِتَٰبَكَ كَفَىٰ بِنَفْسِكَ ٱلْيَوْمَ عَلَيْكَ حَسِيبًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: 'Read your Book! Today your own self is reckoner enough against you!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Read your ledger; this day you are sufficient to take your own account.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Read your scroll; this Day you suffice to take account of yourself."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We will tell him, "Read it and judge for yourself."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It will be said, “Read your ledger; this day you are sufficient to take your own account.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: (It will be said to him): "Read your Book. You yourself are sufficient as a reckoner against you this Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Read your book; your own self is sufficient as a reckoner against you this day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Read thy book! Thy soul suffices thee this day as a reckoner against thee.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (And it will be said unto him): Read thy Book. Thy soul sufficeth as reckoner against thee this day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It will say, "Read your record, today there will be none but yourself to call you to account!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Read thine book; sufficeth to-day thy soul against thee as a reckoner.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: ‘Read your book! Today your soul suffices as your own reckoner.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: (It will be said to him:) "Read thine (own) record: Sufficient is thy soul this day to make out an account against thee."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: (It will be said to him): "Read your book. You yourself are sufficient as a reckoner against you this Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Read your book. Your self suffices you this Day as a reckoner against you'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “Read your book; today there will be none but yourself to call you to account.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [It will be said], "Read your record. Sufficient is yourself against you this Day as accountant."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:14] And it will be said to him: ‘Read your book! This day your soul suffices as your own reckoner’.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: And it will be said to him: (Read thy book. Thy soul sufficeth as reckoner against thee this day) your soul is a witness of what you did.
